ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lhp1cvr.u | |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lhp1cvr.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 3 |  | lhp1cvr.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 5 | 4, 1, 2, 3 | #P_islhp | |- ( K e. A -> ( W e. H <-> ( W e. ( Base ` K ) /\ W C .1. ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simplbda | |- ( ( K e. A /\ W e. H ) -> W C .1. ) |
